computeMatFromVac

public static void computeMatFromVac(javax.vecmath.Vector3d v3d,
                                     javax.vecmath.Matrix4d m)
given a vector, a matrix is computed that would represent that vector. if a "geometry with length 1, at the origin, facing -z" is placed under this matrix, it will have the size and direction of the passed in vector
